pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting Nonlinear Models with Scale Mixture of Skew-Normal Distributions // Fit univariate non-linear scale mixture of skew-normal(NL-SMSN) regression, details in Garay, Lachos and Abanto-Valle (2011) doi:10.1016/j.jkss.2010.08.003 and Lachos, Bandyopadhyay and Garay (2011) doi:10.1016/j.spl.2011.03.019.
